page.title: 09School Projects
page.content: On Wednesday we did a survey. We saw the war memorial. It is a big tall building with a clock in the middle. It is to remind us of all the brave soldiers who died in the war._Louise The children in our class visited the Chiltern Open Air Museum on the 19th June 1985. This museum is set in 25 acres of Newlands Park Training College. All the building are from the Chiltern area. They have been taken down and reassembled. Skilled craftsmen are then employed to restore the buildings to their original state.Vicky and Karen Every year the Studham school children perform in a Christmas Concert in which every child takes part. In 1984 the younger children performed Cinderella(with songs and music by Mr Stephen Beaven) and the older children provided a choir and orchestraV Hodges
